title: Lyft Will Lay Off About 1,200 People as It Looks to Cut Costs
description: The cuts come as the company tries to lower prices and remain competitive with Uber, its larger rival.

title: Twitter Removes ‘Government-Funded’ Labels From NPR and Other Media Accounts
description: NPR and public broadcasters in Canada, Australia and New Zealand had criticized the label as misleading. The CBC and NPR have suspended the use of their Twitter accounts in protest.

title: SpaceX’s Starship Kicked Up a Dust Cloud, Leaving Texans With a Mess
description: Residents of Port Isabel said that their city was covered in grime following SpaceX’s rocket launch on Thursday. The city said there was no “immediate concern for people’s health.”
